title: Healing Grace: Inspirational Poetry for Coping & Closure
description: I am painstakinglymaking my way throughthe emotional ruinsof a life of resistance,climbing over brokenpieces of myselfto reassemblea more durable existence.-Broken PiecesThe paperback version includes photographs by the author of places and images that evoke healing. The book is organized into three Chapters of comfort and guidance for working through the process of emotional healing.
author: Michelle G. Stradford
